sections.heading: and accident insurance; extended disability benefit; how construed
sections.text: Any policy of sickness and accident insurance may contain a provision for paying an extended disability benefit upon the insured's death from any cause, which benefit shall not be construed as life insurance.SourceLaws 1947, c. 164,

44-736.Sickness and accident insurance; extended disability benefit; how construed.

Any policy of sickness and accident insurance may contain a provision for paying an extended disability benefit upon the insured's death from any cause, which benefit shall not be construed as life insurance.

SourceLaws 1947, c. 164, ยง 5(3), p. 462;Laws 1957, c. 188, ยง 18, p. 658;Laws 1989, LB 92, ยง 149.
